name: R-CMD-check

on:
  push:
    branches: [ master ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ master ]

jobs:
  R-CMD-check:
    runs-on: windows-latest  # 使用 Windows 操作系统

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2  # 检出代码
      - name: Set up R
        uses: r-lib/actions/setup-r@v1  # 设置 R 环境
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          install.packages('devtools')
          devtools::install_deps(dependencies = TRUE)  # 安装依赖包
      - name: Check
        run: |
          R CMD build .  # 构建 R 包
          R CMD check *.tar.gz  # 检查包
